Author: fac_ade
Text: It's weird but i kind of relate in a different way to you, same empathy thing and knowing that there's so many people that have to go without food, i feel horrible about wasting food; one of the biggest reasons why (well other than hunger pangs becoming too much) for why i always end up eating more than I'd like to is cause i feel compelled to finish whatever extra large portion of food has been placed in front of me (and was initially why i gained so much weight in the first place, and now it stops me from totally just saying fuck it and throwing out food that is too calorific / i don't like so that i can stay within my ideal intake for the day)

Author: ADFF2F
Text: I don't so much have the problem with being asked for food while I'm eating, because I only really eat at home, but I just wanted to say that I sympathise on the guilt.  I get asked if I have spare change several times a day. Much as I'd like to give them money, I can't give everyone money and I don't want to play god. I don't ever carry cash on me anymore, and walk as fast as I can.   It makes me feel guilty and selfish as well, and it makes me feel guilty that I feel bad, because they clearly have it much worse than me (although I am, I think justifiably, scared that I will one day soon end up like them), so how dare I feel bad.   I don't have any wisdom to share, and I'm sorry that you feel that way, but it did make me feel a little less alone reading it.
